title: Last Week of Free Coaching

embed.description: BurstFire Coaching FAQ What can I get from a coaching session? VOD Review Q+A Verbal Lesson Op.gg review Recording of the whole thing How many of these can I choose? You can choose as many as you want If the session ends before everything is covered future sessions will be scheduled What is a ...

body:
hey guys

its been a good week but im now remembering why i charge for coaching haha

too many people want coaching when its free but wont actually put the work in to improve

for this reason, ive decided that once i move to university in a week i will start charging again

so yeah. you have 8 days to get a free session. GL HF

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BurstFire303,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Vhy1VJ2Y,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-13T07:13:20.269+0000)
>
>  wont actually put the work in to improve

Practice what you preach.

Please don't go around aggravating random people. This guy has experience coaching OCS teams and doesn't care about your opinion. Additionally, please don't insult anyone unless if they have been stuck in Silver/Bronze for more than four years. Thank you!

> [{quoted}](name=lmperius,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Vhy1VJ2Y,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-15T08:56:12.676+0000)
>
> Please don't go around aggravating random people. This guy has experience coaching OCS teams and doesn't care about your opinion. Additionally, please don't insult anyone unless if they have been stuck in Silver/Bronze for more than four years. Thank you!

Practice what you preach.
